segments.pli: yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
segments.en: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’

segments.pli: Evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato cittaṃ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
segments.en: Seeing truly with right understanding like this, the mind becomes dispassionate and freed from defilements by not grasping.

segments.pli: yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
segments.en: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’

segments.pli: Evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato cittaṃ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
segments.en: Seeing truly with right understanding like this, the mind becomes dispassionate and freed from defilements by not grasping.

segments.pli: Rūpadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cittaṃ virattaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti anupādāya āsavehi, vedanādhātuyā … pe …
segments.en: If a mendicant’s mind is dispassionate towards the form element, the feeling element,

segments.pli: viññāṇadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cittaṃ virattaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti anupādāya āsavehi.
segments.en: and the consciousness element, it’s freed from defilements by not grasping.

segments.pli: Vimuttattā ṭhitaṃ. Ṭhitattā santusitaṃ. Santusitattā na paritassati. Aparitassaṃ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
segments.en: Being free, it’s stable. Being stable, it’s content. Being content, they’re not anxious. Not being anxious, they personally become extinguished.

segments.pli: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
segments.en: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”

suttaplex.blurb: Seeing the five aggregates as impermanent, etc., leads to freedom.
